description: This file is a C header file declaring the exported API functions for the Slap Sco Buffer object within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane implementation. It includes function prototypes for creation, removal, initialization, enrollment, and reset operations related to the buffer object.

methods.name: SlapCreateScoBuffer
methods.description: Creates a new SLAP SCO Buffer object, with container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: SlapScoBufCreate
methods.description: Creates a new Slap SCO Buffer instance, with container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: SlapScoBufRemove
methods.description: Removes an existing Slap SCO Buffer object.

methods.name: SlapScoBufEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the Slap SCO Buffer object.

methods.name: SlapScoBufInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Slap SCO Buffer object.

methods.name: SlapScoBufReset
methods.description: Resets the state of the Slap SCO Buffer object.
